snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton accepted an award at her alma mater, Yale Law School, and delivered a speech that took the audience down memory lane, highlighted her passion for children’s welfare and largely avoided politics.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton accepted an award at her alma mater, Yale Law School, and delivered a speech that took the audience down memory lane, highlighted her passion for children’s welfare and largely avoided politics.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton, Waxing Nostalgic, Accepts Award at Yale
